```{r}
#| label: addtabfunc
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

tabfunc <- function(xvar, text, data) {
  tab <- data %>%
    count(!!sym(xvar)) %>%
    mutate(
      np = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, 1), ")"),
      out = case_when(
        n == 0 ~ "-",
        n < 10 ~ "<10",
        TRUE ~ np
      ),
      var = text
    ) %>%
    filter(!!sym(xvar) == 1) %>%
    select(var, out)
}
tab2func <- function(groupvars, filt1 = 10, filt2, filt3 = NULL, text, data) {
  tab <- data %>%
    count(!!!syms(groupvars)) %>%
    mutate(
      np = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, 1), ")"),
      out = case_when(
        n == 0 ~ "-",
        n < 10 ~ "<10",
        TRUE ~ np
      )
    )

  if (is.null(filt3)) {
    tab <- tab %>%
      filter(!!sym(groupvars[1]) %in% c(filt1) & !!sym(groupvars[2]) %in% c(filt2)) %>%
      mutate(var = paste0("Patients treated by ", text[1], " ", !!sym(groupvars[1]), "mg + ", text[2], " ", !!sym(groupvars[2]), "mg**"))
  }
  if (!is.null(filt3)) {
    tab <- tab %>%
      filter(!!sym(groupvars[1]) %in% c(filt1) & !!sym(groupvars[2]) %in% c(filt2) & !!sym(groupvars[3]) %in% c(filt3)) %>%
      mutate(var = paste0("Patients treated by ", text[1], " ", !!sym(groupvars[1]), "mg + ", text[2], " ", !!sym(groupvars[2]), "mg + ", text[3], " ", !!sym(groupvars[3]), "mg**"))
  }
  tab <- tab %>%
    select(var, out)
}
tab3func <- function(groupvars, xvar, filt = NULL, data, groupvartext) {
  tab <- data %>%
    count(!!!syms(groupvars), !!sym(xvar)) %>%
    mutate(
      np = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, 1), ")"),
      out = case_when(
        n == 0 ~ "-",
        n < 10 ~ "<10",
        TRUE ~ np
      )
    ) %>%
    rename(atc = !!sym(xvar))

  if (!is.null(filt)) {
    tab <- tab %>%
      filter(atc %in% c(filt))
  }

  tab <- left_join(tab, lmvarsub, by = "atc") %>%
    mutate(var = paste0("Patients treated by ", paste0(groupvartext, collapse = " + "), " + ", sub, "***")) %>%
    select(var, out)
}
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-dapagliflozine-eplerenone
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false
#| dependson: addtabfunc
#| tbl-cap: "Dapagliflozine/Eplerenone"
#| tbl-pos: "H"

tmp <- rsdata %>%
  filter(shf_indexyear_cat == "2021-2023") %>%
  mutate(
    subvar = case_when(
      !is.na(ATC_sos_lm_sglt2i) & ATC_sos_lm_sglt2i == "A10BK01" &
        !is.na(ATC_sos_lm_mra) & ATC_sos_lm_mra == "C03DA04" ~ 1,
      TRUE ~ 0
    ),
    medvar = case_when(
      sos_lm_sglt2i == "Yes" &
        sos_lm_mra == "Yes" ~ 1,
      TRUE ~ 0
    )
  )
tab1 <- tabfunc("medvar", "Patients treated by SGLT2i + MRA*", tmp)
tab2 <- tabfunc("subvar", "Patients treated by Dapagliflozin + Eplerenone***", tmp %>% filter(medvar == 1))
tab3 <- tab2func(groupvars = c("dose_sos_lm_sglt2i", "dose_sos_lm_mra"), filt2 = c(25, 50), text = c("Dapagliflozin", "Eplerenone"), data = tmp %>% filter(subvar == 1))
tab4 <- tab3func(groupvars = "sos_lm_sglt2i", xvar = "ATC_sos_lm_mra", data = tmp %>% filter(medvar == 1), groupvartext = "SGLT2i")
tab5 <- tab3func(groupvars = "sos_lm_mra", xvar = "ATC_sos_lm_sglt2i", data = tmp %>% filter(medvar == 1), groupvartext = "MRA")

taball <- bind_rows(tab1, tab2, tab3, tab4, tab5)

colnames(taball) <- c("Description", "N (%)")

tab_xls <- taball %>%
  add_row(Description = "") %>%
  add_row(Description = "* % within all patients 2021-2023") %>%
  add_row(Description = "** % within all patients with Dapagliflozin + Eplerenone 2021-2023") %>%
  add_row(Description = "*** % within all patients with SGLT2i + MRA 2021-2023")

# excel
make_one_xlsxsheet(tab_xls)

default_kable(taball,
  escape = TRUE,
  scale_down = F
)
```
